text: Sohail Khan (born 20 December 1970) is an Indian actor, writer, film director and producer who works predominantly in Hindi cinema. He is the younger brother of actors Salman Khan and Arbaaz Khan. He has an elder sister, Alvira Khan Agnihotri. He produces films under his banner Sohail Khan Productions. ==Filmography== ===As actor=== Year Title Role Notes 2002 Maine Dil Tujhko Diya Ajay 2003 Darna Mana Hai Karan Anubhav: An Experience Jaikishan 'Jackie' 2004 Lakeer â€“ Forbidden Lines Karan Rana I Proud to Be an Indian I Krishna Cottage Manav / Amar Khanna 2005 Maine Pyaar Kyun Kiya?
